name: Floating Water Globes
description: Spheres of water suspended by magic create unique environments and potential sources of pure water. The magical nature provides unique research opportunities, while the unstable magic can create constant danger of collapse or magical accidents.
atmosphere: Spheres of pure water float suspended in midair while magical energy maintains their impossible form. The orbs shimmer with otherworldly blue light as research equipment attempts to study the phenomenon. Fresh water scents mix with magical energy. Gravity seems suspended around the floating spheres.
